text: 5x AML Analysts, Zurich. Initial 5 month contract. CHF 600.650 per day. IGA Talent Solutions are currently recruiting for a global consultancy firm, who are seeking 5 AML/KYC Reviewers in Zurich for an initial 5-6 month contract. They need a combination of language skills including:. 1-2 people who speak Russian. 1 person who speaks Hebrew. Turkish nice to have. All contractors must be able to speak fluent English. Brief: KYC Reviewers. Level 1 and Level 2 reviewers required. Must have a minimum of 6 months experience in KYC Review/financial crime. Legal or compliance background. Must have a valid Swiss work permit and be able to work in Zurich.
